p: Each individual essential oil was put in plastic tube in the required proportion ( TableÂ 1), and afterwards, a dilution of 1:100 v/v with methanol was applied using a micropipette Eppendorf (SIGMA-ALDRICH), and finally, a vortex stir (Scientific Industries Vortex Genie2 Vortex Mixer G560E) was carried out for one minute. The final volume was 1 mL.
